I am an [Urban Studies Foundation Postdoctoral Research Fellow](https://www.urbanstudiesfoundation.org/) at the University of Oxford.

As an urban and economic geographer, I study how digital technologies transform markets, cities and inequalities, using mixed-methods that combine qualitative research with computational tools.
